languages.text: "Прости, но, похоже, твое умение вести салонную беседу едва ли превосходит мое. Вдобавок ты и без того в курсе планов Инквизиции в моем лице — твое сопровождение".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс смеется.{/n} "Прости, но, похоже, твое умение вести салонную беседу едва ли превосходит мое. Вдобавок ты и без того в курсе планов Инквизиции в моем лице — твое сопровождение".

languages.text: "Forgive me, but it seems your talent for small talk is scarcely better than mine. And besides, you already know the Inquisition's plans where I am concerned — to accompany you."
languages.original_text: "Прости, но, похоже, твое умение вести салонную беседу едва ли превосходит мое. Вдобавок ты и без того в курсе планов Инквизиции в моем лице — твое сопровождение".

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, but it seems your talent for small talk is scarcely better than mine. And besides, you already know the Inquisition's plans where I am concerned — to accompany you."
"Forgive me, but it seems your talent for small talk is scarcely better than mine. And besides, you already know the Inquisition's plans where I am concerned — to accompany you."
"Forgive me, but it seems your talent for small talk is scarcely better than mine. And besides, you already know the Inquisition's plans where I am concerned — to accompany you."
"Forgive me, but it seems your talent for small talk is scarcely better than mine. And besides, you already know the Inquisition's plans where I am concerned — to accompany you."

languages.text: “恕我直言，你闲聊的技术恐怕和我一样糟糕。而且，你早就知道审判庭对我有什么安排——他们让我陪在你身边。”
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, but it seems your talent for small talk is scarcely better than mine. And besides, you already know the Inquisition's plans where I am concerned — to accompany you."

traits.locale_text: “恕我直言，你闲聊的技术恐怕和我一样糟糕。而且，你早就知道审判庭对我有什么安排——他们让我陪在你身边。”

languages.text: «Perdone, pero parece que su talento para la conversación informal es tan nulo como el mío. Además, ya sabe qué planes tiene la Inquisición por lo que a mí respecta: debo acompañarle».
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, but it seems your talent for small talk is scarcely better than mine. And besides, you already know the Inquisition's plans where I am concerned — to accompany you."

traits.locale_text: «Perdone, pero parece que su talento para la conversación informal es tan nulo como el mío. Además, ya sabe qué planes tiene la Inquisición por lo que a mí respecta: debo acompañarle».

languages.text: 「失礼だが、あなたの世間話の才能は、俺よりとほとんどかわらないようだ。ところで、俺に関する異端審問庁の計画はすでにご存知だろう…そう、俺はあなたに同行しよう」
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, but it seems your talent for small talk is scarcely better than mine. And besides, you already know the Inquisition's plans where I am concerned — to accompany you."

traits.locale_text: 「失礼だが、あなたの世間話の才能は、俺よりとほとんどかわらないようだ。ところで、俺に関する異端審問庁の計画はすでにご存知だろう…そう、俺はあなたに同行しよう」

languages.text: « Pardonnez-moi, mais il semblerait que vous n'ayez pas plus de talent pour faire la conversation que moi. De plus, vous êtes déjà au fait des plans de l'Inquisition en ce qui me concerne : mon rôle est de vous accompagner. »
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, but it seems your talent for small talk is scarcely better than mine. And besides, you already know the Inquisition's plans where I am concerned — to accompany you."

traits.locale_text: « Pardonnez-moi, mais il semblerait que vous n'ayez pas plus de talent pour faire la conversation que moi. De plus, vous êtes déjà au fait des plans de l'Inquisition en ce qui me concerne : mon rôle est de vous accompagner. »

languages.text: "Verzeiht, aber Euer Talent für Smalltalk ist kaum besser ausgeprägt als meines. Außerdem kennt Ihr bereits die mich betreffenden Pläne der Inquisition – Euch zu begleiten."
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, but it seems your talent for small talk is scarcely better than mine. And besides, you already know the Inquisition's plans where I am concerned — to accompany you."

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht, aber Euer Talent für Smalltalk ist kaum besser ausgeprägt als meines. Außerdem kennt Ihr bereits die mich betreffenden Pläne der Inquisition – Euch zu begleiten."

languages.text: "Kusuruma bakma ama havadan konuşma becerin, benimkinden hâllice gibi görünüyor. Ayrıca Engizisyon'un benim de dâhil olduğum planını hâlihazırda biliyorsun: Sana eşlik etmek..."
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, but it seems your talent for small talk is scarcely better than mine. And besides, you already know the Inquisition's plans where I am concerned — to accompany you."
